results.name: default/wordpress

error.Text: Service has not ready endpoints, pods: [Pod/wordpress-864dccf4d7-c9kqd Pod/wordpress-864dccf4d7-h5fvn], expected 2

results.details:
Error: The service is not ready because the expected 2 pods are not available.

Solution: 
1. Check pod status with `kubectl get pods`.
2. Investigate pod logs using `kubectl logs [pod-name]`.
3. Ensure pods are running and healthy.
4. Verify service configuration and connectivity.

results.name: default/wordpress-864dccf4d7-c9kqd

error.Text: Readiness probe failed: HTTP probe failed with statuscode: 500

results.details:
Error: The readiness probe failed because the application returned a 500 status code, indicating an internal server error.

Solution: 
1. Check application logs for errors.
2. Ensure all dependencies are running.
3. Verify configuration settings.
4. Restart the application.
